name: Gingerbread
description: A spiced baked treat traditionally enjoyed during the Christmas season.

name: Panettone
description: Fluffy Italian sweet bread filled with dried fruits and often served at Christmas.

name: Chocolate
description: Rich and versatile sweet enjoyed in countless forms, from desserts to confectionery.

name: Pumpkin roll
description: Soft pumpkin-flavored sponge cake rolled with a creamy filling, popular in autumn and winter.
